description: RAB Homes Nig Ltd — premium luxury real estate development and property management based in Abuja, Nigeria.

pages.title: RAB Homes — Redefining Luxury Living
pages.content: Hero: Redefining Luxury Living. Premium real estate developments inspired by global elegance and crafted for timeless living. Services include luxury property development, sales, property management, consultancy, and investment advisory. Vision: become one of Africa's most respected luxury real estate brands. Leadership: Mr. Usman Rabiu (Founder & CEO) and Abubakar Abdulsamad (Director of Digital Strategy & Technology). Contact teaser: private viewings and bespoke development enquiries.

pages.title: About RAB Homes
pages.content: RAB Homes Nig Ltd is a luxury real estate development and property management company focused on superior quality, refined design, and long-term investment value. Headquartered in Abuja, Nigeria, the company blends American architectural precision, Arabian elegance, and Italian craftsmanship.

pages.title: Properties — RAB Homes
pages.content: A curated collection of premium residences and investment-grade properties. Listings: Amaranta Villa (Abuja, Banex Estate) - 5 beds, 6 baths, 5,400 sq ft; Serengeti Mews (Abuja, Asokoro) - 4 beds, 5 baths; Montclaire Penthouse (CBD) - 3 beds, rooftop terrace; Vanguard Manor (Gudu) - 6 beds, wine cellar, tennis court; Alba Estate Residence (Maitama) - 7 beds, private spa. Each listing includes price in USD and NGN and a short description.

pages.title: Contact
pages.content: Contact RAB Homes for private viewings, investment enquiries, and bespoke development. Headquarters: Abuja, Nigeria. Email: hello@rabhomes.ng. Phone: +234 800 000 0000.

usman-rabiu.bio: Mr. Usman Rabiu is the Founder and Principal Director of RAB Homes Nig Ltd. He is a visionary real estate entrepreneur driven by excellence, integrity, and a passion for delivering world-class property solutions.
